props.about: I am a system engineer who loves learning and programming. I am passionate about technology and I have been working in the software industry for almost 4 years as a developer.
props.experience: I have worked with web technologies in the frontend and backend, using agile methodologies like Scrum, SAFE and Kanban. I am responsible, enterprising and an active person.
